Uses of Class
org.reflections.util.ConfigurationBuilder

  • Packages that use ConfigurationBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.reflections.util  

    • Uses of ConfigurationBuilder in org.reflections.util

      Methods in org.reflections.util that return ConfigurationBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.addClassLoaders​(ClassLoader... classLoaders)
      add optional class loaders used for resolving types.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.addScanners​(Scanner... scanners)
      set the scanners instances for scanning different metadata
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.addUrls​(URL... urls)
      add urls to be scanned
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.addUrls​(Collection<URL> urls)
      add urls to be scanned
      static ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.build​(Object... params)
      constructs a ConfigurationBuilder.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.filterInputsBy​(Predicate<String> inputsFilter)
      sets the input filter for all resources to be scanned.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.forPackage​(String pkg, ClassLoader... classLoaders)
      addUrls(URL...) by applying ClasspathHelper.forPackage(String, ClassLoader...) for the given pkg
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.forPackages​(String... packages)
      addUrls(URL...) by applying ClasspathHelper.forPackage(String, ClassLoader...) for the given packages
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.setClassLoaders​(ClassLoader[] classLoaders)
      set optional class loaders used for resolving types.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.setExpandSuperTypes​(boolean expandSuperTypes)
      if set to true, Reflections will expand super types after scanning.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.setInputsFilter​(Predicate<String> inputsFilter)
      sets the input filter for all resources to be scanned.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.setScanners​(Scanner... scanners)
      set the scanners instances for scanning different metadata
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.setUrls​(URL... urls)
      set the urls to be scanned
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.setUrls​(Collection<URL> urls)
      set the urls to be scanned
